title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The process of updating checkbox states in the table is slow, taking approximately 30 seconds in my case. A busy cursor should be displayed during this operation.
EB: During the update of checkbox states in the table, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate ongoing activity. This process currently takes around 30 seconds in my case.
SR: Improve the efficiency of updating checkbox states in the table to reduce the time it takes, and ensure a busy cursor is shown to provide feedback to the user during this operation.
